    • Uses of SPCredentials in com.sponsorpay

      Methods in com.sponsorpay that return SPCredentials 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SPCredentials SponsorPay.getCredentials(java.lang.String credentialsToken)
      Return the SPCredentials identified by the credentials token ID or throws a RuntimeException if there's none.
      static SPCredentials SponsorPay.getCurrentCredentials()
      Return the current SPCredentials or throws a RuntimeException if there's none.
